sourcesContent:
<select (change)="onChange()"  [(ngModel)]="selectedItem">
    <option *ngFor="let item of showings" [value]="item">{{ item.movieName }}</option>
  </select>
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { ShowingModel } from '../models/showing.model';
import { ShowingService } from '../services/showing.service';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-sale',
  templateUrl: './sale.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./sale.component.css']
})
export class SaleComponent implements OnInit {

  showings!: ShowingModel[];
  selectedItem!: Number;

  constructor(private showingService : ShowingService){}

  ngOnInit(): void {
    try{

      this.showingService.getShowings().subscribe(data=>{
        console.log("Info GET Showing: "+data);
        this.showings = data; 
   
    });
      

    }catch(e){
      console.log("error: "+ e);
    }
    
  }

  public onChange(){

    console.log("ID Selected: "+this.selectedItem);

  }

}
